00050 DouglasPeuckerApproximation::DouglasPeuckerApproximation() {
00051 }
00052 
00053 DouglasPeuckerApproximation::DouglasPeuckerApproximation(const DouglasPeuckerApproximation& orig) {
00054 }

00057 }
00058 
00059 void DouglasPeuckerApproximation::approximate(const std::vector <FrameWithId>& in,
00060         std::vector <FrameWithId>& out) {
00061     approximate(in, out, 0.1);
00062 }
00063 
00064 void DouglasPeuckerApproximation::approximate(const std::vector <FrameWithId>& in,
00065         std::vector <FrameWithId>& out, double epsilon) {
00066 
00067 #ifdef DEBUG
00068     Stopwatch stopwatch;
00069     stopwatch.start();
00070 #endif
00071     std::vector <FrameWithId> inputCopy;
00072     inputCopy = in;
00073     out.clear();
00074     int counter = 0;
00075     douglasPeucker(inputCopy, out, counter, epsilon);
00076 #ifdef DEBUG  
00077     stopwatch.stop();
00078     LOG("Douglas-Peucker approximation algorithm:");
00079     LOG("  - input size: %lu", inputCopy.size());
00080     LOG("  - epsilon: %f", epsilon);
00081     LOG("  - output size: %lu", out.size());
00082     LOG("  - iterations : %d", counter);
00083     LOG("  - duration : %f ms", stopwatch.getElapsedTime());
00084 #endif
00085 }
00086 
00087 void DouglasPeuckerApproximation::douglasPeucker(const std::vector <FrameWithId>& pointList,
00088         std::vector <FrameWithId>& resultList, int& numberOfIterations, double epsilon) {
00089 
00090     ++numberOfIterations;
00091     if (pointList.size() < 2) {
00092         resultList = pointList;
00093         return;
00094     }
00095 
00096     double dmax = 0;
00097     unsigned int index = 0;
00098 
00099     std::vector <FrameWithId> result1;
00100     std::vector <FrameWithId> result2;
00101 
00102     for (unsigned int i = 1; i < pointList.size() - 1; i++) {
00103         double d = utilities::perpendicularDistance(pointList[i], pointList[0],
00104                 pointList[pointList.size() - 1]);
00105         if (d > dmax) {
00106             index = i;
00107             dmax = d;
00108         }
00109     }
00110     //If max distance is greater than epsilon, recursively simplify
00111     if (dmax >= epsilon) {
00112         //Recursive call
00113         std::vector <FrameWithId> pointSubList1(&pointList[0],
00114                 &pointList[index]);
00115         std::vector <FrameWithId> pointSubList2(&pointList[index],
00116                 &pointList[pointList.size()]);
00117 
00118         douglasPeucker(pointSubList1, result1, numberOfIterations, epsilon);
00119         douglasPeucker(pointSubList2, result2, numberOfIterations, epsilon);
00120         resultList.insert(resultList.begin(), result1.begin(), result1.end() - 1);
00121         resultList.insert(resultList.end(), result2.begin(), result2.end());
00122     } else {
00123         resultList.push_back(pointList[0]);
00124         resultList.push_back(pointList[pointList.size() - 1]);
00125     }
00126 }
